ygData.subject: Re: Smithing Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... For sheets of metal, you go to that same Sayer cottage.  I think the only forge in the area is in Qeynos, though.  It s not that far...  :)
ygData.messageBody:
At 15:47 5/11/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>
>
>>
>> I have never seen small molds on Antonica. It'd be near Rivervale if
>> anywhere. You can get large molds from the McMannus Village in the west
>> plains of Karana, and medium from the Sayers in the cottage on the road
>> between Qeynos and Surefall Glade.
>>
>
>Thanks for your reply.
>
>Is there, perchance, a forge near the McMannus Village? And other smithing
>parts? Or do you have to then run to Qeynos?

For sheets of metal, you go to that same Sayer cottage. I think the only
forge in the area is in Qeynos, though. It's not that far... :)

>
>Jyzan
